name: Laser Defender (Luca I)
description:
GamePlay: A simple fun Space shooter game, gain ammo and destroy the enemies! Use arrow keys to move, and space bar to shoot lasers. Make sure you collect yellow lightening bolts for ammo!  Try your best and aim for the best score!

For best experience play in full screen, to be able to see whole screen.

Game is not optimised for mobile use.

Made by Ion Luca Petru - https://github.com/LucaYoy
